Name: Rosie
Base Description: After moving while holding the ball 3 times, ACTIVATE: dribble through your opponent's with ease.
Activated Description: Once per turn, gain +3 movement when moving into an opponent's space while holding the ball.

Name: Bruce
Base Description: After scoring in the paint, ACTIVATE: become an offensive menace in the paint.
Activated Description: When shooting from the paint, if there is an opponent forward or a guard in the paint, -5 shot difficulty.

Name: Casey
Base Description: After becoming exhausted twice, ACTIVATE: give your teammates energy by hustling.
Activated Description: When you become exhausted, your teammates each gain 1 energy.

Name: Brad
Base Description: After you make 2 successful passes, ACTIVATE: all of your passes will be successful
Activated Description: When you pass, ignore the defense. All of your passes will be complete.

Name: Emma
Base Description: After receiving 2 passes, ACTIVATE: get extra actions after receiving passes.
Activated Description: When Emma takes a turn immediately after receiving a pass, she gets +1 action.

Name: Jimmy
Base Description: After hitting 2 shots without missing, ACTIVATE: Become an elite shooter. If you miss a shot, remove all tokens and start over.

Name: Julie
Base Description: When your team has made 2 shots, ACTIVATE: instead of activating yourself, you may Activate one of your teammates. If you do this, remove all activate markers from here and start over.

Name: Lindsey
Base Description: After successfully stealing or intercepting 1 pass, ACTIVATE: move an extra space when your opponent is about to shoot.
Activated Description: If an opponent is about to shoot from a space adjacent to you, you may move into their space before they do.

Name: Luke
Base Description: After missing 2 shots, ACTIVATE: get an extra roll after missing a shot.
Activated Description: After missing a shot, roll the ball once more for a second chance.

Name: MC
Base Description: After you have set 3 screens, ACTIVATE: become an elite screener.
Activated Description: When you set a screen, you may screen on a corner between 3 or 4 spaces at once. When doing this, your screen applies to all lines emerging from that corner.

Name: Michael
Base Description: After moving into an opponent's space 3 times, ACTIVATE: push opponents out of the way.
Activated Description: When moving into an opponent's space, you may push them into any adjacent space.

Name: Nate
Base Description: After your team collects 2 rebounds, ACTIVATE: Nate wins tied rebounds, even on offense.
Activated Description: When your team is tied for a rebound and Nate is in the rebound area, he wins the rebound, even if he is on offense.

Name: Ramona
Base Description: After your team collects 2 rebounds, Activate: become an unstoppable defender in the paint.
Activated Description: When you are in the paint, opponents shooting from the paint get an extra +5 difficulty.

Name: Sara
Base Description: After resting twice, ACTIVATE: resting fully restores your energy.
Activated Description: When you rest, return to the top level of the energy mat.

Name: Lucy
Base Description: After making 2 Hustle Plays, ACTIVATE: Hustle even when you have 1 energy.
Activated Description: You may perform a hustle play even when you have 1 energy.

Name: Jon
Base Description: After making a 3-pointer, ACTIVATE: you are allowed to move a space before shooting.
Activated Description: When you shoot, you may move 1 space before shooting. When doing this, +5 difficulty.

Name: Rudy
Base Description: After getting a steal or intercepting a pass, ACTIVATE: instead of activating yourself, you may de-activate an opponent.

Name: Stacy
Base Description: If you make a shot, ACTIVATE: become a great shooter.
Activated Description: If you miss a shot, DE-ACTIVATE: become a worse shooter.
